Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: InstanceArn
properties.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance that has been replicated.

type.description: The identifier of the Amazon Connect instance that has been replicated.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description for the traffic distribution group.

type.description: A description for the traffic distribution group.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The name for the traffic distribution group.

type.description: The name for the traffic distribution group.

properties.name: TrafficDistributionGroupArn
properties.description: The identifier of the traffic distribution group.

type.description: The identifier of the traffic distribution group.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: The status of the traffic distribution group.

type.description: The status of the traffic distribution group.

properties.name: IsDefault
properties.description: If this is the default traffic distribution group.

type.description: If this is the default traffic distribution group.
